Biography

2023: Came off the bench in nine games as the team’s No. 2 running back… Carried the ball 72 times for 228 yards and three touchdowns, finishing second on the team in rushing TDs and third in rushing attempts and yards… Also caught 23 passes for 160 yards and three touchdowns, tying for second on the team in receiving touchdowns and finishing fourth in catches… Rushed for season-high 56 yards on 13 carries against Concordia Chicago Oct. 14… Caught six passes for a career-best 84 yards including a 48-yard touchdown in the season finale against Eureka Nov. 11.

2022: In first year with the Muskies played in nine games, starting five… Rushed 149 times for 670 yards (4.5 yards per carry average) and three touchdowns, leading team in rushing attempts and finishing second in rushing yards… Also finished fifth in Northern Athletics Collegiate Conference in rushing yards… Rushed for over 100 yards in three games, a string of three straight games late in the season that included a career-best 173 yards against Concordia Chicago Oct. 15… Also caught 19 passes for 146 yards (7.7 yard average), ranking fifth on team in receptions and receiving yards… Posted season highs of nine catches and 79 yards receiving against Concordia Chicago.
